properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
M/V, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, AND LIFERAFT,
THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
ASSISTANCE IN 20-13.06N 022-24.91W AT 030140Z JUN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC MADRID,
PHONE: 349 1755 9132, 349 1755 9133,
E-MAIL: CNCS@SASEMAR.ES.
